question: 1. While wearing a half sleeve T-Shirt, can I wear Arm sleeves to cover my Elbows in Prayer. 2. Did Zainab RA give a speech to Yazid blaming him for the Karbala
answer:
QUESTION

Q.1 While wearing a half sleeve T-Shirt, can I wear Arm sleeves to cover my Elbows in Prayer so that my Prayer has no Makrooh element in it ??? Like these arm sleeves = http://2.bp.blogspot.com/_BoXFp_er_TE/SL005gSIvdI/AAAAAAAAALc/F770tsDWPC0/s320/black arm-sleeves.gif

Q.2 Did Zainab RA give a speech to Yazid blaming him for the Karbala Incident when Ahlebayt were brought into Masjid-e-Amwi in Syria?

ANSWER


Share:

Assalāmu `alaikum Warahmatullāhi Wabrakatuh,

One may wear arm sleeves in salaah to cover the elbows and forearms.

You may forward to us the second question at another time to answer.
